title: TANUVAS Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Assistant Posts
description: The Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (TANUVAS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the TANUVAS Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, ag...
